component.name: LoadingIndicator
component.script:
Sub init() m.spinner = m.top.findNode("spinner") m.spinner.poster.uri = "pkg:/images/loading.png" m.spinner.poster.width = "128" m.spinner.poster.height = "128" m.spinner.visible = "true" m.spinner.control = "start"
centerSpinner() End Sub
Sub centerSpinner() 'Center the Spinner spinnerRect = m.spinner.boundingRect() centerx = (1920 - spinnerRect.width) / 2 centery = (1080 - spinnerRect.height) / 2
m.spinner.translation = [ centerx+10, centery-20 ] End Sub
